title: Simulation Replication — Sim
code: Sim(   taskid,   repid,   output_folder,   overwrite,   integrity,   seed,   n_chains,   n_adapt,   n_iter,   thin,   ess_crit,   max_iter )

title: Simulation Replication — Sim
text: taskid Positive integer. Task ID. repid Positive integer. Replication ID. output_folder Character string. Output folder. overwrite Logical. Overwrite existing output output_folder. integrity Logical. integrity = TRUE, check output file integrity overwrite = FALSE. seed Integer. Random seed. n_chains number parallel chains model. n_adapt number iterations adaptation. n_iter Number iterations monitor. thin Thinning interval monitors. ess_crit Positive integer. Effective sample size critria. max_iter Positive integer. Maximum number reruns get effective sample size.

title: Simulation File Name — SimFN
code: SimFN(output_type, output_folder, suffix)

title: Simulation File Name — SimFN
text: output_type Character string. Output type. Valid values include "data", "fit-dt-var-mx", "fit-meta-var-mx", "fit-ml-var", "fit-jags". output_folder Character string. Output folder. suffix Character string. Output manCTMed:::.SimSuffix().

title: Simulation File Name — SimFN
